{{Wireless embedded system |brand=CommScope |model=AP542 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=01/21/2004 |manuf_country= |manuf=USI |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=IXMAPAGAT02 |ic_id=4110A-APAGAT02 |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2.8 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe=af |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR5312A |cpu1_cspeed= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |fla1= |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1= |ram1_brand= |ram1_model= |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types= |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial=DE-9 |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5312A |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR2112 |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip1_model=AR5312A |wi2_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi2_chip2_model=AR5112 |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols=a |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=abg |default_ssid=My Wireless Network A,My Wireless Network B |default_ssid_regex=^My Wireless Network [AB]{1}$ |default_ip=169.254.128.132 |default_user= |default_pass=public |oui=00:20:A6 |oui_eth=00:20:A6 |default_ch= }} [http://www.systimax.com/products/airspeed/documents/airspeed_installguide_ap542.pdf Install Guide]
[http://www.systimax.com/products/airspeed/documents/airspeed_ap542_2.4.11_userguide.pdf User Guide]
[http://www.systimax.com/products/airspeed/documents/airspeed_ap542_datasheet_us.pdf Datasheet] This device is equivalent to the [[Proxim ORiNOCO AP-4000]]. The default SSID for the 5GHz radio is '''My Wireless Network A'''. The default SSID for the 2.4GHz radio is '''My Wireless Network B'''. The power adapter included with the device is a '''DVE''' DSA-0151F-05 (5V, 2.8A). No firmware was found
